channel.title: markdown on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on An old coder

item.title: What have we learned so far?
item.description: So this morning I didn’t have a blog and now I have this creaking monstrosity that is hosted on a global source code repository and created using a series of command line tools that I didn’t have installed this morning either. Its been a bit of a crazy day but I have accomplished a fair bit. So what do I know now that I didn’t know this morning? #1 git
